descriptions.en: Bidoof has an unsophisticated face and is rarely flustered by anything. There have been incidents involving Bidoof sauntering into villages and gnawing on the houses without a single care.
descriptions.it: Rosicchia continuamente legno e rocce per affilare i denti anteriori. Nidifica vicino all’acqua.
descriptions.es: Roe constantemente los troncos y las rocas para limarse los dientes. Anida cerca del agua.
descriptions.de: Es knabbert ständig an Holz und Steinen, um seine Vorderzähne zu kürzen. Es nistet am Wasser.
descriptions.fr: Il ronge constamment des troncs et des pierres pour se faire les incisives. Il niche le long de l’eau.
descriptions.ko: 항상 큰 나무나 돌을 갉아서 튼튼한 앞니를 갈아내고 있다. 물가에 둥지를 만들어 산다.
descriptions.ja: いつも　たいぼくや　いしを　かじって じょうぶな　まえばを　けずっている。 みずべに　すを　つくり　くらす。
